ValidationRule.description: If user selects "Adjustment Requested" for the field "Billing Issue Cause/Category", they must fill out the following fields: Billing Error Order, Date of Error Causing Adjustment, What is the error?, Reason for Error?, and Estimated Adjustment Amount.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Billing", ISPICKVAL(Billing_Issue_Cause__c, "Adjustment Requested"), OR( ISBLANK(Billing_Error_Order__c ), ISBLANK(CAP_Date_of_Error_Causing_Adjustment__c ), ISBLANK( CAP_What_is_the_error__c ), ISBLANK(CAP_Reason_for_Error__c), ISBLANK( Estimated_Adjustment_Amount__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If "Adjustment Requested" Is selected for "Billing Issue Cause/Category", then you must fill out the following fields: Billing Error Order, Date of Error Causing Adjustment, What is the error?, Reason for Error?, and Estimated Adjustment Amount.
